{{Description|A slender, amphibious fish that has the peculiar habit of warming itself up at the shallows or sandbanks.<br />
Young unagi tend to be transparent throughout, and will only gain their beautiful vermillion ear-fins and red-and-yellow splotches as they mature. Apart from being used as high-end ingredients, they are also often kept as ornamental fish.|[[Archive]] Description}}
'''Red-Finned Unagi''' is a species of Unagi which can be in [[Inazuma]], notably on [[Watatsumi Island]]. It normally can be found with its upper body sticking out the water. After catching one Unagi, nearby ones will normally hide and disappear.

Catching one for the first time will add this creature's entry into your in-game [[archive]].
